---
name: Circle
---

import { GoogleMap, LoadScript, Circle } from "../../lib";
import WithApiKey from "./WithApiKey";

# Circle

```jsx

const CIRCLE_COORD = [
  { lat: -3.745, lng: -38.523 }
]

const circleOptions = {
  strokeColor: '#FF0000',
  strokeOpacity: 0.8,
  strokeWeight: 2,
  fillColor: '#FF0000',
  fillOpacity: 0.35,
  clickable: false,
  draggable: false,
  editable: false,
  visible: true,
  radius: 30000,
  paths: CIRCLE_COORD,
  zIndex: 1
}

<LoadScript
  id="script-loader"
  googleMapsApiKey={API_KEY}
  language={"en"}
  region={"EN"}
  version={"weekly"}
  libraries={[]}
  onLoad={() => console.log("script loaded")}
  loadingElement={<div>Loading...</div>}>

  <GoogleMap
    id="basic-map-example"
    mapContainerStyle={{
      height: "400px",
      width: "800px"
    }}
    zoom={13}
    center={{
      lat: -33.861,
      lng: 151.217
    }}
  >

    <Circle
      path={CIRCLE_COORD}
      options={circleOptions}
    />

  </GoogleMap>
</LoadScript>
```

<WithApiKey>
  {
    (apiKey) => (
      <LoadScript
        id="script-loader"
        googleMapsApiKey={apiKey}
        language={"en"}
        region={"EN"}
        version={"weekly"}
        libraries={[]}
        onLoad={() => console.log("script loaded")}
        loadingElement={<div>Loading...</div>}>

        <GoogleMap
          id="circle-example"
          mapContainerStyle={{
            height: "400px",
            width: "800px"
          }}
          zoom={7}
          center={{
            lat: -3.745,
            lng: -38.523
          }}
        >

        <Circle
          center={{
            lat: -3.745,
            lng: -38.523
          }}
          options={{
            strokeColor: '#FF0000',
            strokeOpacity: 0.8,
            strokeWeight: 2,
            fillColor: '#FF0000',
            fillOpacity: 0.35,
            clickable: false,
            draggable: false,
            editable: false,
            visible: true,
            radius: 30000,
            zIndex: 1
          }}
        />

        </GoogleMap>
      </LoadScript>
    )

}

</WithApiKey>
